title: Diabetes' sworn enemy could ultimately be a valuable ally

title_detail.value: Diabetes' sworn enemy could ultimately be a valuable ally

summary: A research team unravels an adaptive mechanism involved in controlling insulin action, showing that glucagon plays a crucial part in it and can thus be a protective asset.

summary_detail.value: A research team unravels an adaptive mechanism involved in controlling insulin action, showing that glucagon plays a crucial part in it and can thus be a protective asset.
